section.sectiontext: The prescribed form for the purposes of section 63 (1) of the Family Relations Act is the following:

section.sectiontext: The prescribed fee for the purposes of section 63 (2) of the Family Relations Act is $5.

subsection.subsectiontext: Where a spouse under the age of 19 years has capacity in law to sign and execute the form prescribed by subsection (2), the "Affidavit of Witness" or "For Maker of a Deed" for that spouse shall be amended to state his actual age in years.
